FW TCOSTORAGE CONTRACT QUANTITY FOR MARCH Cc Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday February AM To Subject TCOSTORAGE CONTRACT QUANTITY FOR MARCH COLUMBIA GAS TRANSMISSION CORPORATION NOTICE TO ALL INTERESTED PARTIES FEBRUARY Notice ID NO RESPONSE REQUIRED Please be advised that the Maximum Monthly Withdrawal Quantity MMWQ for March is being increased from to of the Storage Contract Quantity SCQ Customers requesting excess Maximum Daily Withdrawals must call Gas Control hours in advance at to request approval For additional information please contact your Customer Services Representative

FW System Imbalance NoticeFirst time that I have seen this notice on Tansco Original Message From CustomerNotices WGPHOU mailtoWGPHOU illiamscom Sent Monday February AM Subject System Imbalance Notice February To Transcontinental Gas Pipe Line Corporation Customers and Shippers Re System Imbalance Notice Transco has traditionally experienced significant negative transportation imbalances deliveries in excess of receipts on its system when cash out index pricing is significantly lower than spot gas pricing Based upon current gas prices and current index averages in addition to a significant increase in market loads for the balance of the month it is likely Transco will experience significant negative imbalances Transco reminds its customers and shippers that according to Section of Rate Schedules FT and IT they have the responsibility to adjust and maintain a concurrent balance between receipts and deliveries Transco expects all parties to adhere to this requirement to ensure that there will be no loss in Transcos operational flexibility Transco will closely monitor system conditions and if shippers and customers do create significant negative imbalances Transco may be required to initiate restrictive practices at its pooling points and disallow makeup transportation If you have any questions please call Terry Fitch at or John McGrath at Terry C Fitch Manager Gas Operations
